channel.title: Certain food of texts
channel.description: Recent content on Certain food of texts

item.title: Hello World
item.description:
Hello world. This is the very first day this page has lived. But surely it has several abandoned predecessor. Let’s all hope for it to survive. And by overriding github default page generator content, here I present its birth.

I love cats, but I won’t post about cats here. I expect this page will be filled by posts of review, my thought on some manga I’ve read or music I just listen. Could be some work/tech related thingy, but no cats. Hopefully.

Those of you who come here looking to stuff your stomach, well you visit the wrong place. But do feel free to visit whenever you like.

ps: some of you might associate ‘ayambakar’ with roasted chicken
